conversation.phrase: So, that's why Monty and I vowed never to do drugs, because drugs are bad. Right, Monty?
conversation.label: Moo-moo (Don):
conversation.name: Moo-moo (Don)
Monty (Robin)
conversation.phrase: Well, sure. Man-made chemical stuff. But, things that grow in nature, they're okay to try, like, once or twice.
conversation.label: Monty (Robin):
Moo-moo (Don):
conversation.phrase: Not looking for grey areas here, Monty.
conversation.name: Moo-moo (Don)

conversation-text:
Moo-moo (Don): So, that's why Monty and I vowed never to do drugs, because drugs are bad. Right, Monty?
Monty (Robin): Well, sure. Man-made chemical stuff. But, things that grow in nature, they're okay to try, like, once or twice.
[beat]
Moo-moo (Don): Not looking for grey areas here, Monty.
conversation-title: Don and Robin, How I Met Your Mother, S5E24
